me day 2dai!!

heya peeps dis is da first time i dun 1 of these so if it suks dnt tell me hah!

2dai pwetti much sucked lol
well i got up (no duh) nd got readi went round ma m8s house be4 school as i do every day nd we raced eachother on our ds fun!!

went to school 1st we had er... science that was ok i sit next to bex so that was ok nd we dun this realli wierd practicl 2 do wid soil wtf..? why we laernin bout soil?

then we had maths twas funni cus we had a cover teacher so we just pwetti much pissed around lol i felt realli sowwi 4 ma m8 jo cus her friend carly was off ill agen (cough) so jo was on her own sittin on this table wid this girl hu she h8s ouch!
then we had english nd at break we went in there nd there was all these yr11 hu were settin fire to their hands nd tings around the room then they just started attacking me nd sam wid pens we were sittin there nd they were thorwin em at us it was like wtf is ur problem w@#ka lol.

then we had design that was funni lol i spent all lesson annoyin jo as usual lol
nd then we had .. music which suked so me nd ma m8s just started pissin bout wid keyboards
lol twas fun lol
well anyway that was about it 4 2dai
so ill c ya 2mozz thne bye
x

2dai was pwetti borin!

heya peeps
well 2dai was sooo borin nutin realli gd happened lol
it suked
onli gd bit was that on mario kart ds ma m8 chris actualli wona race nd he ALWAYS loses
as u can c pwetti much borin dai
so..
bye
x

footie 2dai !! ouch!!

well hi peeps u come bak 4 another excitin blogg thne go to ma m8 jo's syte then this 1 will be borin as usuall ty!!

well wot i did 2dai not much realli
i had r.e 1st lesson that was ok cus we were in a3 a compudda room yay lol nd we had to design a jewish kosher food law msnu type tingie v borin then we had english nd we had a seatin plan about 2 weeks ago nd as soon as me nd alex dearle got in we swapped seats so i cud sit next to ma lovely gf bex lol but thne onli 2dai we had to move bak cus deborah samuels (bitch) dobbed us in cus well we all h8 her nd she h8s us as i sed bitch!!
then geographie well borin that it 4 that
maths was ok i sat next to bex yay
but jamna nd priya sat in jaks nd sami's seats so they had to sit away from us 2
p.e was funni we had outdoor footie i had da ball nd started peggin it down da pitch hehe go me!one! when liam f slide tachled me nd i went flyin!! wee !!! twas funni but kinda hurt but i dint realli tink that it hurt cus i was to busy laughin to not realli think about how much ma back hurt lol
nd now im sittin here writin this pointless blogg yay
nd ouch ma foot just cramped byebye
ima go sort it out
xx
bye

boo!!

heya peeps here's another awesum blogg by not me wow!!
todai was quite borin maths was ok science was blargh french was ok kinda funni i kept tryin to talk 2 jo but jak kept puttin his fat head in da way.
drama was sme as usual was funni though cus we made this missing poster tingy (dnt ask) nd we made alex dearle put it round his neck nd he stood there with this piece of paper hanging from his neck sayin have you seen this man with a mahoosiv arrow pointin at him hehe


after that i came home walkin ome wid ma m8 chris nd his gf joana jkin jo not realli he likes tazz onli jkin agen lol


well that's about it well then
erm bye x
p.s jo no i wont help you wid da omework

2dai was wierd!!

heya peeps 2dai well:
we had art 1st which wasnt 2 kl cus i usualli sit next to ma m8 ricky but cuz he was skivin agen!! i ended up sittin on ma bill which wasnt to gd but then hannah knicked da table so i sat in da corner on ma bill wid onli the 1 table i luked so pathetic then bex came in askin 4 sum papa wierd gyal jkz luv ya bex!!

anyway then we had german ndmiss made us learn about parts of the body then we had to stand up nd do this kinda wierd dance thingy then had to do this song about head shoulders nd shit lol
lifeskills was so borin
french was ok spent half the lesson playin hangman which was ok
then we had english which was wiked but i kinda got scarred cus i had ashleigh james nd kelly mc farleine i tink u spell it like that tink it wud be funni if ashleigh wud start flirtin wid me in front of bex nd i got realli scared nd bex was like wtf lol but thne we had laptops nd mucked arround wid them lol twas kl then walkin ome i walked wid tom nd chris nd jo nd tazz i aint seen tom in a while so that was kl then we had jo nd tazz callin me gay which i got kinda pissed off about!! i no they were onli jkin but twas not v nice
anyway
bye
xx

sum tings that happened to me 2dai

hi peeps here are wots happened to me 2dai:

1) todai we had pe 1st ting nd we were ment to have calasthenics(sp but instead sir took us out onto the field nd we spent all lesson doin su crappi relay shit but it wasnt even relay cus we spent ALL lesson running round in circles like headless chickens lol

2) todai in history at the end i went up o arange(sp? oh hu cares) nd on ma sheeyt at the top i had put carl andrews ma fake name nd on da sheet miss put down carl andrews cuz she doesn't know ma name loo i thaught it was funni

3)in maths we got moved to a11 wen we ment to be in a13 its dred cuz we onli moved cuz we had 5 peeps from the dumbass class jkz move up to our class ricky anderson ma m8 sam coz ma m8 matt bullen ma m8 najiir uddin (sp he ok nd beth paine i h8 her anyway nd that was that

4) ict erm twas ok cus we spent all lessons designin posters nd ticket nd websytes 4 a shakespeare tingy twas fun not erm i spent ll lesson huggin bex nd stuff then scott goes u realli shudnt be doin that cuz peeps wud tink that u r goin out nd we both luked at him nd sed "we are goin out u moron" nd he was like "oh , i neva get told anytin" he is soo anoyin

5) in science it pwetti much sucked except at the end nathan lloyd matthew bullen daniel nd both liams f nd o took papa clipsa nd rubba bandsa (dunno y i put a on end) nd miss got mr dooby to come in nd they had to enpty their pockets nd bags to see what they had but they got cockey nathan hid his stuff down his trousers ew daniel hid em in his shoes nd liam nd matt i hav no idea lol i dint get searched cuz i neva took any nd miss trusts me


6) oh nd at lunch we asked miss yousaf if we cud go nd eat in her room cuz we bin baned cuz peeps keep leavin shit in the room (not literally) lol but we went canteen st by the time we got bak every1 was in there so we went to miss dutts room nd she goes " can i ask u 2 a persnal question , how long hav u 2 bin goin out" i was like that not v personal but w/e so i sed bout a month ish ask bex she counts the days saddo jkz thne she left nd i played this song i got off ma m8 stephen in form tis the song from south prk movie the 1 that goes
" shut ur fukin face uncle fukka"nd etc.etc.etc.
tis awesum anyway
byexx

random shit!! yay!!

well wot can i say bout 2 dai well :
1) im so bored
2) y/dai walkin ome tamzin asked me hu had a deepa voice her or jo nd i came to say that she had so she was like oh yea im more boyish than u jo nd then jo started callin tamzin tomzin tom 4 short
3)todai in geographie i got bout 5 peeps to call her tomzin
4)at lunch ma m8s emptied ma bag nd then chucked it round da room not funni nd was kinda gay, i got pissed off woo hoo
5)pe we did outdoor footie wid both groups
dat bout it ma day was borin bye
x

2dai is gonna rawks!

hi peeps soz i aint dun a blogg in ages i realli cba lol anyway

todai im w8in 4 ma mum to get back from da home from lukin afta ma nan i aint seen ma mum since wednesday cus she bin up home lukin afta ma nan.
anyway then ima goin georges house then we gonna go meet up wid becca in town then muck round
then i goin back to his house to piss bout lol
then we goin to his uncle( house cus they havin a aniversary party nd ima goin i alreadi got peeps to dance wid lol
then i sleepin round his 4 da night.
then 2mozz we gonna go bikin
monday me nd bout 12 m8s lol
x
bye
x

george killed laura !aww!

well hi peeps todai was awesum i been out everyday this holiday so i aint realli had time to do a blog but now i doin 1 wow!
well todai george killed laura (not literalli) cus
1) we went up town
2)got realli bored
3)went into 99p store
4) baught sum drinks called boo bees
5)baught sum bow nd arrow play sets(hehe)
6)we went into park
7) we pulled ends of arrows(da gummy bits)
8)we were firin em in da air nd makin em stik in floor lol
9)then george got cockey nd thaught he cud shoot em above lauras head
10)so he tried it nd ended up hittin her eye oww!
11)he tried it again, hit her lip nd it started bleedin nd she started cryin i feel sowwi 4 her so i gave her hug!
12)she died lol
that was ma day

bye peeps
x
x
x
